content: are you looking for a quick easy & very cute pattern that s perfect for valentine s day or just to show a little love well look no further than this pattern which includes instructions on how to make it in both coaster or dish/wash cloth sizes color combinations are endless grab your hook & cotton yarn & whip up a few from your friends child s teachers neighbors or even for your next market **materials** **➤yarn ** 100% cotton ➤yardage 25-35 yds per coaster / 60-80 yds per dish/wash cloth **➤hook ** 5 0 mm *contact the designer https //linktr ee/marshayarndoodles* this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell copy transfer trade distribute or claim this pattern or its images as your own feel free to sell finished products made with this pattern please credit @marshayarndoodles as the pattern designer this pattern is property of @marshayarndoodles © 2024
